actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide a punishment of death or life imprisonment for persons who sabotage nuclear facilities, hijack, or sabotage vehicles transporting nuclear material, or who coerce others by threatening exposure to atomic radiation, and to provide a procedure for the sentencing of such persons.

summary.text: Radioactive Material Protection Act - Makes it a Federal crime, punishable by life imprisonment or death, to sabotage nuclear facilities, hijack or sabotage vehicles transporting nuclear materials, or coerce others by threatening exposure to atomic radiation.

titles.title: A bill to provide a punishment of death or life imprisonment for persons who sabotage nuclear facilities, hijack, or sabotage vehicles transporting nuclear material, or who coerce others by threatening exposure to atomic radiation, and to provide a procedure for the sentencing of such persons.
